message.entry: The number of features to cluster must be greater than or equal to the number of clusters.
Removed {0} out of {1} feature vectors because they contain Inf or NaN.
Too many feature vectors contain Inf or NaN. There are not enough valid features remaining to create {0} clusters.
All feature vectors contain Inf or NaN.
Invalid feature size for ''BboxIoU'' metric. Data must be of size N-by-4, instead the size is {0}.
